Package com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.services

Class UserDetailsServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.services.UserDetailsServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service
public class UserDetailsServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Implementation of user details service. Retrieves user and permission from database, then creates and returns a user details object. User can be found either by supplying a user id or a username (email).

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    UserDetailsImpl loadUserById​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Retrieves user by user id, retrieves permission based on the user id and then creates a user details object that is returned
    UserDetailsImpl loadUserByUsername​(java.lang.String email)
    Retrieves user by username (email), retrieves permission based on the user id and then creates a user details object that is returned

    • loadUserByUsername

      public UserDetailsImpl loadUserByUsername​(java.lang.String email) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Retrieves user by username (email), retrieves permission based on the user id and then creates a user details object that is returned
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      email - the email for which to find a user
      Returns:
      user details object containing a user and security information
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the username (email) doesn't match any existing user

    • loadUserById

      public UserDetailsImpl loadUserById​(java.util.UUID userId) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
      Retrieves user by user id, retrieves permission based on the user id and then creates a user details object that is returned
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to find a user
      Returns:
      user details object containing a user and security information
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a user is not found for the supplied user id
